title: Heap buffer overflow in mruby value_move
vulnerability_information:

I did a brief search and find my fuzzing finding was very similar to `https://hackerone.com/reports/204421`, which is supposed to be fixed in `https://github.com/mruby/mruby/commit/f198530444f4b5ebfd011c3287114951c8553e5e`. However, `https://github.com/mruby/mruby/commit/736be0e98b9e1136a4dc7cb2dd05e1f33728f767#diff-86406329889f2c13524766839f0a96b3` reverted that fix, making the bug present again on current top master branch. So I'm reporting here again as a new issue.

Thanks!

activities.message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Thank you for your report. We've reproduced the crash and opened an issue upstream: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/issues/3478

Thanks again for your report. This issue was resolved upstream in https://github.com/mruby/mruby/commit/27ec2437fd240b10d0745256e813000b3d5d359a

Our next round of bounty decisions will take place within two weeks, so we'll be in touch with you again soon.
